Sentence.sentence: It's a dramatic endorsement for a technology most people think about only when their smartphone goes  dark.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: After reading a book on how to address for success, he had purchased an expensive dark navy suit and golden tie.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For most of human history, we all had dark skin.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's a dramatic endorsement for a technology most people think about only when their smartphone goes dark.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都含有"完全地或不完全地缺少光亮"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: dark, dim, black, gloomy, obscure, vague, grey
means: dark ： 最普通用词，指缺乏自然光线或人工照明，使某物漆黑无光或光线十分微弱。
dim ： 指光线不足或视力较差，不能清晰地看见物体。
black ： 侧重颜色是黑色的，有时也指无光的黑暗。
gloomy ： 指光线不足或部分光线受阻而出现的阴暗。
obscure ： 指因光线不充足而使物体灰暗不清，失去光泽或若隐若现。作借喻时指因复杂、深奥或含糊而难于理解。
vague ： 通常作借喻用，形容抽象事物。
grey与dark意思相近，但侧重阴暗单调的意味。

Sentence.sentence: Because it was getting dark,and she didn't want her mother to worry about her.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 答案 答案

Sentence.sentence: Dark environments are more likely to encourage overeating, for people are often less self-conscious (难为情) when they're in poorly lit places – and so more likely to eat lots of food.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Finally, after more than an hour in the dark and the icy cold, simon had to make a decision.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I could only have left it on the G9 bus, which was now speeding in the dark to some unknown station.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I encountered many hikers who were headed to a distant camp-ground with just enough time to get there before dark.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: I go back years ago, when we lived in a three-room house, when we got up before daylight and worked till after dark to make ends meet.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: I had to reach the top! but it was now getting real dark.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: I saw a dark future for my once sweet daughter.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'd skipped nearby Guilin, a dream place for tourists seeking the limestone mountain tops and dark waters of the Li river which are pictured by artists in so many Chinese paintings.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In most cities the sky looks as though it has been emptied of stars, leaving behind a vacant haze that mirrors our fear of the dark.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: On the edge of the Jacket, there is a piece of cloth which/that gives off light in the dark.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: So I ran back home almost in the dark while trying not to get too scared.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: The dark cloud above one of the world's toughest criminal neighbourhoods simply disappeared for a few days.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The dark-colored road surface makes the youngsters hard to be noticed.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The forest in the dark is dangerous for them.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: The hall was dark when I came in; the show was about to begin.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: We've grown so used to this orange haze that the original glory of an unlit night--dark enough for the planet venus to throw shadow on earth.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a dark-colored cake was served on a black plate rather than a white one, customers recognized it as sweeter and more tasty.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When the children are walking or cycling to school on dark mornings, car drivers can easily see them.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: With shining dark eyes, he seems like the of kid who would enjoy public speaking.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: While more families buck an older-generation proclivity to leave kids in the dark about real estate decisions, realty agents and psychologists have mixed views about the financial, personal and long-term effects kids'opinions may have.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: That was a dark, moonless night.
sentences.cn: 那是一个黑暗的、无月光的夜晚。

sentences.en: The night is too dark for us to see.
sentences.cn: 夜间太暗, 我们看不见。

sentences.en: This is a dark suit.
sentences.cn: 这是套深色的西装。

sentences.en: The colour of this cloth is too dark.
sentences.cn: 这布的颜色太深了。

sentences.en: Her large dark eyes are flashing.
sentences.cn: 她那双黑色的大眼睛亮晶晶的。

sentences.en: You should turn the light on at dark.
sentences.cn: 天黑时你应开灯。

sentences.en: There is too much dark in this painting.
sentences.cn: 这幅画颜色太暗。</seg>

means.word_mean: 暗的,黑暗的;深的;阴郁的

phrase.cizu_name: the darkest hour is just before the dawn

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)when things seem to be at their worst they are about to start improving
keep something secret from other people

phrase.cizu_name: a shot (或 stab) in the dark

jx.jx_en_mean: an act whose outcome cannot be foreseen; a mere guess

lj.lj_ly: high-level decisions made in the dark.
lj.lj_ls: 高层决定是秘密地制定的

jx.jx_en_mean: In a state of ignorance; uninformed

lj.lj_ly: kept me in the dark about their plans.
lj.lj_ls: 我对他们的计划一无所知

entry.def: When it is dark, there is not enough light to see properly, for example because it is night.

example.ex: When she awoke it was evening and already dark...
example.tran: 她醒来时已是晚上，天已经黑了。

example.ex: It was too dark inside to see much...
example.tran: 里面太暗，看不太清。

entry.def: The dark is the lack of light in a place.

example.ex: Her mother was sitting in the dark by the stove in her rocking chair...
example.tran: 她母亲坐在炉边暗处的摇椅里。

example.ex: I've always been afraid of the dark.
example.tran: 我一直很怕黑。

entry.def: If you describe something as dark, you mean that it is black in colour, or a shade that is close to black.

example.ex: He wore a dark suit and carried a black attaché case...
example.tran: 他身穿暗色西服，手提黑色公文包。

example.ex: The heavy dark table is inlaid with lighter wood.
example.tran: 笨重的深色桌子上嵌有颜色较浅的木头。

entry.def: When you use dark to describe a colour, you are referring to a shade of that colour which is close to black, or seems to have some black in it.

example.ex: She was wearing a dark blue dress.
example.tran: 她穿着一件深蓝色的礼服。

entry.def: If someone has dark hair, eyes, or skin, they have brown or black hair, eyes, or skin.
entry.tran: (头发、眼睛或肤色)棕色的，黑色的

example.ex: He had dark, curly hair...
example.tran: 他有一头卷曲的黑发。

example.ex: Leo went on, his dark eyes wide with pity and concern.
example.tran: 利奥接着说下去，他的黑眼睛瞪得大大的，充满怜悯和关切。

entry.def: If you describe a white person as dark, you mean that they have brown or black hair, and often a brownish skin.
entry.tran: (白人）有着棕色（或黑色）头发（且皮肤略带棕色）的，肤色深的

example.ex: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman...
example.tran: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

example.ex: The driver was very dark. Maltese, maybe.
example.tran: 司机一头乌发、肤色黝黑，可能是个马耳他人。

entry.def: A dark period of time is unpleasant or frightening.

example.ex: Once again there's talk of very dark days ahead...
example.tran: 又有传言说以后的日子会非常艰难。

example.ex: This was the darkest period of the war.
example.tran: 这是那次战争中最黑暗的时期。

entry.def: A dark place or area is mysterious and not fully known about.

example.ex: The spacecraft is set to throw new light on to a dark corner of the solar system.
example.tran: 这艘宇宙飞船可能会让人们对太阳系中的一个神秘角落有更新的认识。

example.ex: ...the dark recesses of the mind.
example.tran: 隐秘的思想深处

entry.def: Dark thoughts are sad, and show that you are expecting something unpleasant to happen.

example.ex: Troy's chatter kept me from thinking dark thoughts.
example.tran: 特洛伊的喋喋不休让我暂时收起了阴郁思绪。

entry.def: Dark looks or remarks make you think that the person giving them wants to harm you or that something horrible is going to happen.
entry.tran: (眼神或话语）阴险的，邪恶的，不祥的

example.ex: Garin shot him a dark glance, as if in warning.
example.tran: 加林恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼，似乎是在警告。

example.ex: ...dark threats.
example.tran: 恶毒的威胁

entry.def: If you describe something as dark, you mean that it is related to things that are serious or unpleasant, rather than light-hearted.
entry.tran: （指与严肃或令人不快的事物相关的)黑色的

example.ex: Their dark humor never failed to astound him...
example.tran: 他们的黑色幽默总能让他咋舌。

example.ex: Nina took a kind of dark pleasure in being the focus of the tension between her father and her brother.
example.tran: 对成了父亲和哥哥紧张关系的焦点，尼娜有点幸灾乐祸。

entry.def: If you do something after dark, you do it when the sun has set and night has begun.

example.ex: They avoid going out alone after dark.
example.tran: 他们避免在天黑以后独自外出。

entry.def: If you do something before dark, you do it before the sun sets and night begins.

example.ex: They'll be back well before dark.
example.tran: 他们会在天黑前早早返回。

entry.def: If you are in the dark about something, you do not know anything about it.

example.ex: The investigators admit that they are completely in the dark about the killing...
example.tran: 调查人员承认他们对这起谋杀一无所知。

example.ex: I managed to keep my parents in the dark about this...
example.tran: 我设法对父母瞒下了此事。

entry.def: If you describe something someone says or does as a shot in the dark or a stab in the dark, you mean they are guessing that what they say is correct or that what they do will be successful.

example.ex: Every single one of those inspired guesses had been shots in the dark.
example.tran: 所有那些凭直觉的猜测都是无根据的瞎猜。

means.word_mean: 2. absence of moral or spiritual values;
4. the time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside

sentences.sentence: "he was in the dark concerning their intentions"

means.word_mean: 1. devoid or partially devoid of light or brightness; shadowed or black or somber-colored;

sentences.sentence: "dark as the inside of a black cat"

means.word_mean: 2. (used of color) having a dark hue;

sentences.sentence: "dark colors like wine red or navy blue"

means.word_mean: 3. brunet (used of hair or skin or eyes);
4. stemming from evil characteristics or forces; wicked or dishonorable;

sentences.sentence: "his black heart has concocted yet another black deed"
"the scheme of some sinister intelligence bent on punishing him"-Thomas Hardy
"the first dismal dispiriting days of November"
"the dark mysteries of Africa and the fabled wonders of the East"
"a saturnine, almost misanthropic young genius"- Bruce Bliven

means.word_mean: 8. lacking enlightenment or knowledge or culture;

sentences.sentence: "a dark age in the history of education"

means.word_mean: 9. marked by difficulty of style or expression;

sentences.sentence: "much that was dark is now quite clear to me"
"those who do not appreciate Kafka's work say his style is obscure"

means.word_mean: 10. having skin rich in melanin pigments;

sentences.sentence: "National Association for the Advancement of Colored People"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English deorc, of Germanic origin, probably distantly related to German tarnen 'conceal'

sentences.en: a dark room/street/forest

sentences.en: the darkest days of Fascism

sentences.cn: 这是那次战争中最黑暗的时期。
sentences.en: This was the darkest period of the war.

sentences.cn: 他在黑暗的地窖中把头撞在墙上.
sentences.en: He hit his head against the wall in the dark cellar.

sentences.cn: 黑暗的日子很快地就要临到世上,一个哀悼和极大悲伤的日子.
sentences.en: Dark days are soon coming upon the earth . Days of mourning and great sadness.

sentences.cn: 所以他们说: [ 我们不能把她埋在黑暗的地底.
sentences.en: So they said, " We cannot bury her in the dark ground. "

sentences.cn: 开悟只意味着你整个存在是有意识的: 你的内在没有留下一丝黑暗的角落.
sentences.en: Enlightenment only means that your whole being is conscious: therefore no dark corners left inside you.

sentences.cn: 照亮黑暗的高高烛火多么高贵.
sentences.en: How high that highest candle lights the dark.

sentences.cn: 调整梯度,使黑暗的一面是对左下角.
sentences.en: Adjust the gradient so the dark side is on the bottom left.

sentences.cn: 我们摸索着走过黑暗的街道.
sentences.en: We groped our way through the dark streets.

sentences.cn: 盗贼将手电筒照进黑暗的房间.
sentences.en: The burglar shone his torch into the dark room.

sentences.cn: 把灯往黑暗的角落里照,好让我们看见那里有什么.
sentences.en: Shine your light in that dark corner so that we can see what is there.

sentences.cn: 黎明之前,是最黑暗的时刻.
sentences.en: The darkest hour comes before dawn.

sentences.cn: 我凝视那黑暗的角落.
sentences.en: I peered into the dark corner.

sentences.cn: 情报官躬身行礼然后退下了,只有冯德瑞斯一人留在那黑暗的房间里.
sentences.en: The informant bowed and headed through the door , leaving V'Dreth alone in the dark chamber.

sentences.cn: 因为,在最黑暗的时刻,有一点变得格外清晰,那就是,生命是无价的财富.
sentences.en: For in the darkest moment it becomes vividly clear that life is a priceless treasure.

sentences.cn: 这位科学家的实验很清楚地表明了在黑暗的蜂房里,蜜蜂是怎样以很巧妙的方式传递信息的.
sentences.en: The scientist's experiments have thrown great light on the amazing ways honeybees communicate in their dark hives.

sentences.cn: 那黑暗的屋墙上突然亮起一盏灯光.
sentences.en: A light shone out of the dark wall of the house.

sentences.cn: 在那黑暗的年月,他们受过许多屈辱.
sentences.en: They suffered many humiliations in those dark days.

sentences.cn: 在黑暗的走廊上,他一头撞在玻璃门上了.
sentences.en: He ran his head against the glass door in a dark corridor.

sentences.cn: 夏天的阅读一直延续,在黑暗的冬日里再次回味.
sentences.en: A summer read to be kept and revisited in the dark days of winter.

sentences.cn: 中国是个不可忽视的农历, 每一个月开始,最黑暗的一天.
sentences.en: Chinese months are reckoned by the calendar, with each month beginning on the darkest day.

sentences.cn: 一只老鼠从黑暗的洞口跑出.
sentences.en: A mouse ran out from the dark orifice of the cave.

sentences.cn: 他是我的一个朋友, 我们曾一同度过那黑暗的岁月.
sentences.en: He's a friend of mine; we passed the dark days together.

sentences.cn: 当天变黑暗的时候, 通信恶化.
sentences.en: As it grew dark, communications deteriorated.

sentences.cn: 闪电像火花一样布满了整个黑暗的天空.
sentences.en: Lightning filled the dark sky like fireworks.

sentences.cn: 万事都有个终结, 黑暗的静寂是个人独有的.
sentences.en: Somewhere there is an end to everything, and the loneness of the dark is one's own.

sentences.cn: 歹徒时常在黑暗的街道上攻击被害者.
sentences.en: Muggers often assault their victims on dark streets.

sentences.cn: 那么您一般需要一个黑暗的颜色,作为一种色锚.
sentences.en: Well you generally need a dark color that acts as a chromatic anchor.

sentences.cn: 奇怪的蒸汽从黑暗的湖中升起.
sentences.en: VAPOR Strange vapors rose from the dark lake.

sentences.cn: 索洛佐在那儿没有动,脸正面对着厕所的门, 乌黑的眼睛闪耀着机警的光芒.
sentences.en: Sollozzo was sitting directly facing the door of the toilet, his dark eyes blazing with alertness.

sentences.cn: 她那乌黑的眸子闪出的光芒洋溢着一种生命力.
sentences.en: In her eyes, which were very dark, there was a life.

sentences.cn: 一根乌黑乌黑的辫子翘在脑后,齐耳的鬓发微微卷曲,顽皮地浮在脸颊上.
sentences.en: A dark plaits sticking on the hindbrain, curled and naughty hair covers on the cheek.

sentences.cn: 她有一双同样炯炯有光, 滚圆而乌黑的眼睛, 上面复盖着两道长睫毛.
sentences.en: She has the same rich, full, dark eyes, with its long lashes.

sentences.cn: 乌黑的铜器需要阳光的照射,才能显出它们发绿的颜色.
sentences.en: The dark bronzes wanted sunlight upon them to bring out their tinge of green.

sentences.cn: 索洛佐坐在餐桌的对面, 他那乌黑的脸上露出了一副像劫掠成性的秃鹫的凶相.
sentences.en: Sollozzo sat across the kitchen table from him. His dark face had a peculiarly vulturine look.

sentences.cn: 她很瘦弱,一头乌黑的短发,一双黝黑,深陷的眼睛.
sentences.en: A slim cropped dark hair and deep, dark eyes.

sentences.cn: 你的思想将从你乌黑的眼眸中飞出,像鸟儿飞出窝巢.
sentences.en: Your thoughts will stray out of your dark eyes like birds from their nests.

sentences.cn: 她乌黑的眸子却因心潮起伏而晶莹发亮.
sentences.en: Her dark eyes were luminous with the feeling that glowed within.

sentences.cn: 她抬起乌黑的眼珠,瞧着矮矮的天花板.
sentences.en: She cast up her dark eyes to the low ceiling.

sentences.cn: 他站起身来，乌黑的眼睛里喷射着怒火。
sentences.en: He got to his feet and his dark eyes were blazing with anger.

sentences.cn: “不要为那个感到沮丧，”他一边说，一边抚弄着本乌黑的卷发。
sentences.en: "Don't let that get you down," he said ruffling Ben's dark curls.

sentences.cn: 丈夫流露出一种奇怪而忧郁的紧张神情.
sentences.en: There was a strange, dark tension about her husband.

sentences.cn: 悲观的;忧郁的;忧愁的.
sentences.en: Your meaning is too dark for me.

sentences.cn: 她吻了吻他，久久凝视着他乌黑忧郁的双眼。
sentences.en: She kissed him and gazed into his dark, brooding eyes.

sentences.cn: 暗能量是一种神秘的力量,它加速了宇宙的膨胀.
sentences.en: Dark energy is a mysterious force that speeds up the expansion of the Universe.

sentences.cn: 最后, 我希望她有一个黑暗, 寒冷和神秘的一瞥.
sentences.en: Finally, I wanted her to have a dark, cold and enigmatic glance.

sentences.cn: 回家的路上, 他们得穿过一片漆黑神秘的森林.
sentences.en: As they were riding home back, they had to pass through a dark and mysterious forest.

sentences.cn: 暗能量是一种神秘的与万有引力相反的排斥力, 它使宇宙膨胀.
sentences.en: Dark energy is a mysterious repulsive force that opposes gravity, causing the universe to expand.

sentences.cn: 黑暗的房间；昏暗的街道；黑黝黝的森林

sentences.en: This was the darkest period of the war.

sentences.en: Vanish in dark, the empty apparition!

sentences.en: Dark days are soon coming upon the earth . Days of mourning and great sadness.

sentences.en: He spent only 300 dollars on the car, which was simply a steal.

sentences.en: So they said, " We cannot bury her in the dark ground. "

sentences.en: Enlightenment only means that your whole being is conscious: therefore no dark corners left inside you.

sentences.cn: 这就是声名狼藉的黑暗物质, 其重力效应是我们认定它存在的唯一依据.
